themes: lack of transparency in funding decisions
concerns about sustainability and longevity of support
perceived imbalance in the funding system
key_phrases: why my company is not competitive enough to receive ongoing support
how can these awards actually build sustainability/longevity
emphasis on diversity actually represent diversity but not in a such a racially/compartmentalized way
it feels that it has become too literal where its actually a limitation
doesn't actually consider the wholeness of a community
I want people to be able to forget those distinctions and feel safe to embrace togetherness
barriers_identified: lack of clarity in funding competitiveness
solutions_proposed: diversity should consider the wholeness of a community rather than compartmentalized categories
